data.message:
This shows why eminem will always remain in front, he had a rough childhood and does't want these kids to live the same bad days, and people are saying why dont you pay it all urself? Seriously? Open your minds people,he's done everything he could which other artist did this for his hometown? The amount of money he donated for charitys😐the last thing that he'll ever think about will be money💎❤️💝
#EMINEM=#LEGEND
